content: this is the pattern for the book cover the post also includes all the links to the stitch tutorial for the pages one each stitch tutorial there is a pattern designed to make a page for this sensory book i did not list the yardage needed this project take a lot of yarn because of the heavily textured pages this is a perfect project is a perfect stash buster for all the stitch tutorials and the cover pattern i used worsted weight yarn and a size h crochet hook my daughter loves this book
